dataList.content: <color=#ebcaa2>Win the next battle to recruit a Sinner!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>Win the next battle to gain E.G.O Gift {reward}!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>{target} {conditional} will enter the next combat encounter with {stack} {buffName}.</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>Thereâ€™s a new path on the map!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>Enemy waves reduced by {waveNum} for the next battle</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>At the start of the combat phase,</color> allies without <color=#a0392b>Wrath Affinity Attack Skill</color> <color=#ebcaa2>take</color> <color=#e30000>5 Wrath damage</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>At the start of the turn,</color> </color=#ebcaa2>heal</color> <color=#00ff9c>10 HP</color> and <color=#80c9ff>10 SP</color> (Up to 3 turns)
<color=#e30000>Skill Final Power -1</color> <color=#ebcaa2>at the start of the combat phase.</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>At the start of the next battle,</color> <color=#ebcaa2>Ally Units without</color> <color=#bb521f>Lust Affinity Attack Skill</color> <color=#ebcaa2>are Staggered</color>
<color=#e30000>Speed -2</color> <color=#ebcaa2>at the start of the combat phase.</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>At the start of the next battle, All Ally Units</color> <color=#ebcaa2>gain</color> <color=#f8c200>3 Attack Power Up.</color>

<color=#ff0000>Combat Encounter!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>All enemies</color> <color=#ebcaa2>are inflicted with</color> <color=#e30000>5 Attack Power Down!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The chosen Sinner</color> <color=#ebcaa2>gains</color> <color=#e30000>3 Damage Down</color> <color=#ebcaa2>for the next 2 battles.</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who failed the check takes</color> <color=#e30000>12 HP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage and</color> <color=#fe4b48>8 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who failed the check takes</color> <color=#e30000>15 HP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage and</color> <color=#fe4b48>12 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who failed the check takes</color> <color=#fe4b48>15 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who passed the check takes</color> <color=#fe4b48>5 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who failed the check takes</color> <color=#fe4b48>25 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who failed the check takes</color> <color=#fe4b48>12 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who failed the check takes</color> <color=#fe4b48>10 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>

<color=#ebcaa2>Identities without</color> <color=#7d4e94>Envy Affinity Attack Skill</color> <color=#fe4b48>take</color> <color=#e30000>15 HP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage and</color> <color=#fe4b48>15 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>

<color=#ebcaa2>Identities without</color> <color=#e48801>Sloth Affinity Attack Skill</color> <color=#fe4b48>take</color> <color=#fe4b48>12 HP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage and</color> <color=#fe4b48>12 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>One random Identity without</color> <color=#a0392b>Wrath Affinity Attack Skill</color> <color=#ebcaa2>takes</color> <color=#fe4b48>10 HP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>One random Identity without</color> <color=#306471>Gloom Affinity Attack Skill</color> <color=#ebcaa2>takes</color> <color=#fe4b48>10 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Identity with the lowest Sanity who possesses</color> <color=#306471>Gloom Affinity Attack Skill</color> </color=#ebcaa2>fully heals their</color> <color=#f8c200>HP.</color>

<color=#ebcaa2>Identities without</color> <color=#7d4e94>Envy Affinity Attack Skill</color> <color=#fe4b48>take</color> <color=#e30000>15 HP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage and</color> <color=#fe4b48>15 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The chosen Sinner</color> <color=#ebcaa2>has</color> <color=#e30000>10 Rupture</color> <color=#ebcaa2>for 1 turn in the next battle.</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>Start the next battle with</color> <color=#f8c200>+2 E.G.O resources</color> <color=#ebcaa2>of all affinities</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>All allies have</color> <color=#f8c200>+2 Skill Final Power</color> <color=#ebcaa2>for the next battle</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>All allies have</color> <color=#f8c200>+1 Skill Power</color> <color=#ebcaa2>for the next battle</color>
<color=#ebcaa2>The Sinner who failed the check takes</color> <color=#e30000>15 HP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage and</color> <color=#fe4b48>12 SP</color> <color=#ebcaa2>damage!</color>
